CustomField.description: helps draft the Intralinks name, requires cleansing outside of Salesforce and once it's finalized, it can be imported back in. old formula: if( Investor_Opportunity__r.Investment_Vehicle__r.Name ="BIF III", Investor_Opportunity__r.BIF_III_Investor_Number__c +"-"+text( Investor_Opportunity__r.Sleeve__c )+"-"+ Investor_Opportunity__r.Intralinks_Folder_Name_Final__c ,if(text(Investor_Opportunity__r.Sleeve__c )="US","Inv"+"-"+ Legal_Name_Auto__c ,"Inv"+text(Investor_Opportunity__r.Sleeve__c )+"-"+ Legal_Name_Auto__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: helps draft the Intralinks name, requires cleansing outside of Salesforce and once it's finalized, it can be imported back in to the Intralinks Final field.
CustomField.label: Intralinks Folder Name
